item.title: Explain spec please
item.dc:creator: @wouterscape wouterscape
item.description:
@wouterscape wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 /*Whip*/ ) { //if player is wearing item 4151 (whip)
		specbar(12323); //special bar the bar it self
		}

	if (specBar >= 100)
	{
	frame230(0, 12325, 0, 0);//beginning //thes are the fragments the bar is filling
	frame230(0, 12326, 0, 0);//2nd part //''
	frame230(0, 12327, 0, 0);//3rd part //''
	frame230(0, 12328, 0, 0);//4th part //''
	frame230(0, 12329, 0, 0);//middle //''
	frame230(0, 12330, 0, 0);//4 from end //''
	frame230(0, 12331, 0, 0);//3 from end //''
	frame230(0, 12332, 0, 0);//2 from end //''
	frame230(0, 12333, 0, 0);//1 from end //''
	frame230(0, 12334, 0, 0);//end //''
	}
	if (specBar == 50)
	{
	frame230(0, 12328, 0, 0);//4th part the same as as above but now its half full
	frame230(0, 12329, 0, 0);//middle
	frame230(0, 12330, 0, 0);//4 from end
	}
	if (specBar == 0)
	{
	specbar(12325);
	}
}

i hope u had somting about this
